statements: SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM volunteer_contacts;
SELECT email, phone_number, name FROM volunteer_contacts;
SELECT phone_number, email, name FROM volunteer_contacts;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_contacts;
SELECT name FROM volunteer_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_contacts WHERE email='john@example.com';
SELECT name, email FROM volunteer_contacts ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM volunteer_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_contacts WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM volunteer_contacts;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_id = 123;
SELECT volunteer_id, activity_name, date FROM activities WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM volunteers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT volunteer_id, activity_name, date FROM activities ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_name FROM activities;
SELECT id, name, email FROM volunteers JOIN activities ON volunteers.id = activities.volunteer_id;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, phone_number FROM volunteers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_roles WHERE role_name='Admin';

SELECT va.assignment_id, v.name AS volunteer_name, vr.role_name AS role_assigned FROM volunteer_assignments va JOIN volunteers v ON va.volunteer_id=v.volunteer_id JOIN volunteer_roles vr ON va.role_id=vr.role_id;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT v.name, vr.role_name FROM volunteers v JOIN volunteer_roles vr ON v.volunteer_id = vr.role_id;

SELECT v.name, va.start_date, va.end_date, vr.role_name FROM volunteers v JOIN volunteer_assignments va ON v.volunteer_id = va.volunteer_id JOIN volunteer_roles vr ON va.role_id = vr.role_id WHERE va.start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT v.name, v.email, vr.role_name FROM volunteers v LEFT JOIN volunteer_assignments va ON v.volunteer_id = va.volunteer_id LEFT JOIN volunteer_roles vr ON va.role_id = vr.role_id WHERE va.end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Volunteers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT phone_number, name FROM Volunteers WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM VolunteerTasks WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT skill_name FROM VolunteerSkills WHERE skill_name LIKE '%computer%';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE id = 10;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM VolunteerTasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT id, phone_number FROM Volunteers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM VolunteerSkills WHERE skill_name = 'Communication';
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM volunteers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT v.name, e.event_name, a.assignment_date FROM volunteers v JOIN assignments a ON v.id = a.volunteer_id JOIN events e ON a.event_id = e.id;
SELECT v.name, vs.skill_name FROM volunteers v LEFT JOIN volunteer_skills vs ON v.id = vs.volunteer_id WHERE vs.skill_name = 'Coding';
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone_number FROM contacts WHERE contact_phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT v.name, v.email, e.event_name FROM volunteers v JOIN assignments a ON v.id = a.volunteer_id JOIN events e ON a.event_id = e.id;
